scripts.validate: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.test:api: npm run build && k6 run dist/api-test.js
scripts.test:load: npm run build && k6 run dist/load-test.js
scripts.test:stress: npm run build && k6 run dist/stress-test.js
scripts.test:spike: npm run build && k6 run dist/spike-test.js
scripts.test:volume: npm run build && k6 run dist/volume-test.js
scripts.test:soak: npm run build && k6 run dist/soak-test.js
scripts.test:quick: npm run build && k6 run dist/api-test.js && k6 run dist/load-test.js && k6 run dist/spike-test.js
scripts.test:all: npm run build && k6 run dist/api-test.js && k6 run dist/load-test.js && k6 run dist/stress-test.js && k6 run dist/spike-test.js && k6 run dist/volume-test.js && k6 run dist/soak-test.js
scripts.cloud:api: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'K6_CLOUD_TOKEN=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_API_TOKEN K6_CLOUD_HOST=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_HOST K6_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID k6 cloud dist/api-test.js'
scripts.cloud:load: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'K6_CLOUD_TOKEN=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_API_TOKEN K6_CLOUD_HOST=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_HOST K6_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID k6 cloud dist/load-test.js'
scripts.cloud:stress: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'K6_CLOUD_TOKEN=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_API_TOKEN K6_CLOUD_HOST=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_HOST K6_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID k6 cloud dist/stress-test.js'
scripts.cloud:spike: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'K6_CLOUD_TOKEN=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_API_TOKEN K6_CLOUD_HOST=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_HOST K6_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID k6 cloud dist/spike-test.js'
scripts.cloud:volume: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'K6_CLOUD_TOKEN=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_API_TOKEN K6_CLOUD_HOST=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_HOST K6_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID k6 cloud dist/volume-test.js'
scripts.cloud:soak: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- bash -c 'K6_CLOUD_TOKEN=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_API_TOKEN K6_CLOUD_HOST=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_HOST K6_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID=$GRAFANA_CLOUD_PROJECT_ID k6 cloud dist/soak-test.js'
scripts.cloud:all: npm run cloud:api && npm run cloud:load && npm run cloud:stress && npm run cloud:spike && npm run cloud:volume && npm run cloud:soak
